name: NaamgebruikCodelijst_to_HumanNameAssemblyOrder
title: NaamgebruikCodelijst to HumanNameAssemblyOrder
description: Maps NameUsage codes as found in the [zib NameInformation v1.1 (2020)]( https://zibs.nl/wiki/NameInformation-v1.1(2020EN)) to HumanName.extension(humanname-assembly-order) codes as found in FHIR R4.
